entry.string: The Authinvision module allows you to authenticate a user with your Invision Board database. The Authinvision module checks the username and password from the login screen against the Invision database and returns true for a match.
entry.translation: Zee Ootheenfisiun mudoole-a elloos yuoo tu oozeenteecete-a a user veet yuoor Infeesiun Buerd detebese-a. Zee Ootheenfisiun mudoole-a checks zee userneme-a und pessvurd frum zee lugeen screee egeeenst zee Infeesiun detebese-a und retoorns trooe-a fur a metch.

entry.string: Authinvision does not log users into both systems at once, nor does it allow users who register on xaraya to have their user information duplicated in the Invision database. It is highly suggested that you turn off xaraya registration and use your Invision board's registration/password retrieval process.
entry.translation: Ootheenfisiun dues nut lug users intu but systems et oonce-a, nur dues it elloo users vhu regeester oon xereya tu hefe-a zeeur user inffurmeshun doopleeceted in zee Infeesiun detebese-a. It is heeghly sooggested thet yuoo toorn ooffff xereya regeestreshun und use-a yuoor Infeesiun buerd's regeestreshun/pessvurd retreeefel prucess. Um gesh dee bork, bork!

entry.string: Authentication by Authinvision is automatically set once the the Authinvision module has been initialized. You must configure Authinvision before a user will be able to login to Xaraya. To remove Authinvision authentication, you must remove the module.
entry.translation: Oozeenteeceshun by Ootheenfisiun is ootumeteecelly set oonce-a zee zee Ootheenfisiun mudoole-a hes beee ineetielized. Bork bork bork! Yuoo moost cunffeegoore-a Ootheenfisiun beffure-a a user veell be-a eble-a tu lugeen tu Xereya. Tu remufe-a Ootheenfisiun oozeenteeceshun, yuoo moost remufe-a zee mudoole-a.

entry.string: From the menu, you have one choice. "Modify Config".
entry.translation: Frum zee menoo, yuoo hefe-a oone-a chueece-a. "Mudeeffy Cunffeeg".

entry.string: Modify Config -- From here, you can configure the authinvision server that will be used for authentication. A user that has account information in Invision to be automatically added to the Xaraya database and allowed to login.
entry.translation: Mudeeffy Cunffeeg -- Frum here-a, yuoo cun cunffeegoore-a zee ootheenfisiun serfer thet veell be-a used fur oozeenteeceshun. A user thet hes eccuoont inffurmeshun in Infeesiun tu be-a ootumeteecelly edded tu zee Xereya detebese-a und ellooed tu lugeen.

entry.string: usercp: a block that mimics the user links from Invision.
entry.translation: usercp: a bluck thet meemics zee user leenks frum Infeesiun. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: whos_online.php: a who's online block that replaces the one in the roles module.
entry.translation: vhus_oonleene-a.php: a vhu's oonleene-a bluck thet repleces zee oone-a in zee rules mudoole-a.
